entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regex Source Generator doesn't react when removing the attribute invocation causing it to break the design time build. #69880
  • [NativeAOT] Issue with expressing a Expression<Delegate> in a RD.xml file #69875
  • [Android] Some System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests failing #69870
  • [release/7.0-preview5] Assertion failure in interpreter on v8/windows: `src/mono/mono/mini/interp/interp.c:3440` #69868
  • [release/7.0-preview5][wasm] Assertion failure in interpreter `src/mono/mono/mini/interp/interp.c:2114` #69864
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) when calling Managed function using C# #69862
  • [wasm] perf pipeline builds failing to build the wasm app #69861
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests timing out on Windows #69860
  • Question: how could we execute code in a standalone assembly load context? #69855
  • Many jobs are failing with a 401 response #69854
  • mono Linux x64 Methodical_others error on runtime rolling build #69853
  • Implement proper File System detection for Apple OSes #69852
    7.0.0
  • How about use IReadonly with Options pattern #69851
  • Mono Browser wasm Release failures on runtime rolling build #69850
  • Debugger cannot evaluate when multiple event handlers was bound. #69849
  • Symbol stripping in NativeAOT to reduce binary size #69847
  • macOS Process.GetProcessesByName can not get process when process name length more than 15 #69846
  • [macOS] Listing system certificates bails out on invalid certificates in keychain #69845
  • Wasm bindings need an error handling overhaul #69836
    Future
  • Test failure System.Reflection.Tests.MethodInfoTests.CallStackFrame_AggressiveInlining #69835

Closed

  • Process.GetProcesses returns processes with truncated names on MacOS #69883
  • superpmi.py: enable collection/replay of JIT asserts #41649
    7.0.0
  • MethodInfo objects for same method are not equal #67989
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6.0.0-rc.2 on Raspberry Pi cannot write to writable network file #61175
    7.0.0
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize issue with arrays/lists and whitespace #69859
  • Pass through diagnostic information for failed calls to IPC WriteDumpAsync #64069
    7.0.0
  • Improve the dotnet-dump error message: Core dump generation FAILED 0x80004005 #54521
    7.0.0
  • High native memory usage in certificate revocation checking #52577
    7.0.0
  • CLRJit Access Violation on when attempting to run Windows ARM64 app #69222
    7.0.0
  • Strange error message from LibraryImport #69827
  • Analyzer/fixer for converting Regex use to source generator #68147
    7.0.0
  • Skip AMSI anti-malware scan when loading an assembly #69844
  • [Uri] Absolute paths using UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute parsed as relative on iOS and Android #69618
    7.0.0
  • Debug API methods returns "The operation failed because the debugger could not get the metadata. The error code is CORDBG_E_MISSING_METADATA, or0x80131C35." message on .NET 6 #69841
  • Add PoolingAsyncValueTaskMethodBuilder to System.Net.Security.SslStream.ReadAsyncInternal() #68467
    7.0.0
  • ProcessName returns truncated 15 char string on MacOS #69726
  • Data Annotation Extensions #69834
  • Test failure Interop\\COM\\Activator\\Activator\\Activator.cmd #62696
    7.0.0
  • Outerloop stress legs triggering on PRs they shouldn't #69829
  • Remove un-needed target when upgrading to v2 BuildTools #8050
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Speed up Convert.ToBase64String() #69884
    community-contribution
  • limit retries of EPROTOTYPE on macOS #69882
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • Remove CORCOMPILE_IMPORT_SECTION #69881
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix Stream.ReadAtLeast perf regression in DataContractSerializer #69879
    area-Serialization
  • JIT: defer some flow graph reordering until after loop recognition #69878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement PemEncoding.WriteString #69877
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [QUIC] Latest msquic interop #69876
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [QUIC] Fix flags usage on Linux #69874
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm][debugging] Adding instructions for native debugging #69873
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Adding analyzer/fixer for the Regex Source Generator (#68976) #69872
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Move off preview onto regular Windows 11 client images #69871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Enable JitConsumeProfileForCasts by default #69869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Make `interp_to_native_signatures_count` static #69867
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/7.0-preview5] Revert "[mono][interp] Add tiering within interpreter (#68823)" #69866
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Faster long->int overflow checks #69865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable runtime test failing due to stack overflow #69863
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Process WebSocket connection errors on NodeJS #69858
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add issue cleanup documentation and update automation #69857
    area-Meta
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix entrypoint breakpoint when it's an async method #69856
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add support for processing Unified TLS frames #69848
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Implement LoadLibraryErrorTracker #69842
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] enable the promote feature. #69840
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Remove Or, And, Not + related fixes #69839
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [NativeAot] Null ref return is wrapped in TargetInvocationException #69838
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Pin char when UTF-16 marshalling is specified and runtime marshalling is disabled #69837
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Restore internal tools #69753
  • Disable failing MsQuic tests on Windows #69798
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Redisable timouting MsQuic tests #69843
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Make SPMI collections work on crashes/assertion failures #69494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix value type unboxing bug #69815
    area-System.Reflection
  • File system type fix #69484
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Update gcc leg to 12.1.0 #69188
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Reduce unnecessary casting/locals in pinning path #69804
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fixed the exception's dispatch by EPC. #69712
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Better createdump error messages #69663
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove extraneous diagnostic #69830
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Adding analyzer/fixer for the Regex Source Generator #68976
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Some clean-up of host tests #69802
    area-Host
  • pool async state in SslStream #69418
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add EvaluationResult Scheme for arrays. #67095
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix VM calling convention detection for some pinvokes #69774
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add default method support to virtual statics #69783
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix whitespace in repro project #69825
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • Optimize better with maximum array length #69735
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactoring the generic-math CreateChecked/Saturating/Truncating APIs to match API review #69756
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • A few tweaks to regex source generator comments / naming for lookbehinds #69773
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Cryptography.Xml.Tests: skip tests that require rsa+sha1 when platform doesn't support it. #69713
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Keep native order of get members call from Type #69506
    area-System.Reflection
  • [release/6.0] Add Fedora 37 RID #65392
    NO-MERGE, area-Host, community-contribution
  • Enable server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #69833
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Relax the addres exposure condition in forward substitution #69818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Resumbmit tar feedback changes, include Android build fix #69469
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Annotate System.Runtime tests for NativeAOT #69803
  • Implement fake hot/cold splitting and corresponding stress mode #69763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement get bytes from loaded_files using debugger protocol. #69072
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Consolidate morphing of local nodes #69819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding support for vector constants via GenTreeVecCon #68874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove the pid argument on Windows createdump only take dumps of the parent process #68877
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the segment fault within JIT_UpdateWriteBarrierState. #69782
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [Android] Add UnmanagedCallersOnly attribute to SafeDeleteSslContext.ReadFromConnection/WriteToConnection methods #69507
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Pass Vector128 in SIMD registers, when LLVM is enabled #68991
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [Android] Fix app crash when using non-native HttpClientHandler #69565
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Convert Valuetype.FastEqualsCheck and GetHashCodeOfPtr to managed #69723
    community-contribution
  • Move macOS remote unwinding to libunwind directory #69720
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [MONO] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Display parents' members on GetProperties. #68907
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Cleanup idle rate limiters #69677
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [draft] [wasm] JS Marshaler based on code-gen and [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Updating Vector*.IsHardwareAccelerated to be recursive #69578
    area-System.Numerics
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add more array.sort test combination #68489
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Mark IQueryable.DefaultIfEmpty() as nullable #69821
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • WIP: Support array parameter types of custom attributes in Mono AOT compiler #69759
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Equals/GetHashCode for UnixDomainSocketEndPoint #69722
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add new public APIs for safely manipulating managed pointers #69458
    blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm][debugger] Enabled null-conditional operator on EvaluateOnFrame #69307
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Cleanup a few more allocations in X.509 #69831
    area-System.Security
  • CI fix for native aot tests #69571
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on Node.js #68807
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Creating comma temps differently for SubMulDiv morph #69770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • exclude markdown changes from triggering a build in pipeline #25664
  • Building legacy iOS projects fails with latest Mono and .NET 6.0.300 SDK #25651
  • [ARM64] With SDK 3.1.420 and 6.0.301 installed, failed to load the dll from [C:\Program Files\dotnet\host\fxr\6.0.6\hostfxr.dll], HRESULT: 0x800700C1 when dotnet run 3.1 project #25649

Closed

  • dotnet test adds a stray quotation mark to the -property:VSTestResultsDirectory property in 7.0.100-preview2 #24999
  • dotnet workload install fails to recognize new workload manifest #25629

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow dotnet workload update print-download-link-only to work with when update available in newer feature band #25669
    Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25650
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25626
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Implement new flag for ignoreing apphosts in dotnet run #25647
    Area-CLI
  • Implement functionality for templating workload and version constraints #25505
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal]: First class native integer support #4385
    Working Set

Updated

  • [Proposal]: `NotNullWhenMember` attribute #5600

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update utf8-string-literals.md based on recent LDM decisions #6154
  • Update static-abstracts-in-interfaces.md based on recent LDM decisions #6153
  • Tweak numeric IntPtr spec #6167

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • We should have a snippet that inserts all required-to-be-initialized fields #61550
  • When copying and pasting C# code that contains errors, the auto-formatter kicks in and makes the code look bad #61545
  • VS 2019 compiler issue following use of Quick action feature #61544
  • C# override autocomplete should not use expression body syntax #61543
  • Position of new class method which is created outside of the class via VS-proposals seems to be arbitrary #61542
  • Raw string literal interpolation close character completion should work #61541
  • Test `SourceGeneration.SyntaxAwareGeneratorTests.Syntax_Provider_Doesnt_Attribute_Incorrect_Timing` is flaky #61540
  • Move to namespace refactoring doesn't work with file-scoped namespace #61539
  • NRE in `VisualBasicAddExplicitCastCodeFixProvider` #61538
  • IDE should show modifiers in quick info #61536
  • IDE should highlight required members when in an initializer #61534
  • Enhanced `#line` directives should be supported independent of language version #61530
  • False negative error CS9503 "Required member cannot be less visible than the containing type" for member in nested type #61528
  • False positive error CS9503 "Required member cannot be less visible than the containing type" for member in nested type #61527
  • Delegates with nint types in the signature don't get NativeIntegerAttributes anymore #61525
  • Public APIs for opened and closed event handling for non-source documents #61523
    17.3

Closed

  • Improve `NormalizeWhitespace` for nested `fixed`/`using` statements without blocks #61518
  • Decompilation navigation box is not cancellable #28274
    Backlog
  • Null Reference while accessing GlobalOptionService #61473
  • Breaking change in overload resolution around string literals #60612
    17.3
  • "..."u8 doesn't work in attributes #60626
    17.3
  • Extremely high OOP memory usage #61314
  • Improve CPSProject_IWorkspaceProjectContext.cs #29281
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Final prototype comments and top level statements local adjustments #61551
    Area-Compilers
  • Update 'Rename's commit behavior to be async. #61549
    Area-IDE
  • Fix the project layout #61547
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix VB compiler crashes when decoding attributes #61537
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Don't throw in logging when the document path contains curly braces (#61524) #61535
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Change natural type of UTF-8 string literals to `ReadOnlySpan<byte>` and null terminate the underlying blob. #61532
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Find implementation assemblies for reference assemblies in the .NET SDK #61526
    Area-IDE
  • EnC: Implements support for adding and removing await/yield return in C# - IDE #61521
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Skip timing test #61222
    Area-Compilers, Disabled Test, Next
  • Merge main into features/semantic-snippets #61546
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61548
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Prepare VB iterators for EnC support #61488
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Expose VirtualChars to asp.net (through EA) to facilitate route classification #61529
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update 'Encapsulte Field' to use the new background work indicator. #61531
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update versions to use most recent LanguageServer changes. #61496
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve normalization to match idiomatic patterns for nested usings and fixed statements. #61533
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61520
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Simplify error handling and notifications in rename. #61515
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't throw in logging when the document path contains curly braces #61524
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Fix AbstractLanguageService constructor #61513
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove Utf8StringLiteral conversion #61481
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals, Next
  • Extract checking for generic constraint context to extension method #61485
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Initial documentation for the TestAccessor Pattern #28967
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix setup authoring bug #61508
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add embedded classification for field initializers #61522
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Unify the final state management processing in inline-rename. #61512
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • IDE Support for Required Members #61440
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61552
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove unused private members #61064
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Switch AsyncCompletion to new pooled CompletionItemList based APIs #61477
    Area-IDE
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove invalid implicit downcast #19932
    Area-Compilers
  • Add opened and closed event handling for non-source documents #61377
    Area-IDE
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add tool window #61499
    Area-Compilers
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements #61356
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • Semantic Snippets - Remove reflection and call the LanguageServerSnippetExpander directly #61491
    Area-IDE
  • Mask count in shift operations on native integers #61341
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Reduce allocations in DirectMemoryAccessStreamReader.ReadToEnd #61351
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement AsyncLazyInitializer #31060
    Area-IDE
  • Provide parse options to the language service more quickly #60855
    Area-Compilers
  • Rename methods with conditional success to Try* pattern #27915
    Area-IDE
  • Fix cancellation leaks #20111
    Area-IDE, cla-already-signed, PR For Personal Review Only

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Asp.net core DI error #41881
  • HealthCheckService execution leads to a deadlock in the DI stack #41880
  • Load the HTTPS developer certificate from disk instead of the Keychain on macOS #41879
  • Narrow the scope of install and trust for the developer HTTPS certificate on macOS #41878
  • .NET 6 Blazor IBrowserFile's OpenReadStream().ReadAsync(buffer) not able to read all bytes #41875
  • Support configuring the defaults for JWTs created using the user-jwts tool #41872
    7.0-preview6
  • CookieBuilder SameSite XML documentation is incorrect #41871
  • Hot Reload (Blazor WASM) not working when Solution Configuration is not Debug #41867
    Backlog
  • Non-conforming container support in Minimal APIs #41863
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Add a Redis-backed token bucket RateLimiter implementation #41861
    .NET 7 Planning
  • builder.Services.AddHostedService<TimerBackgroundService>(); has no effect #41860

Closed

  • .NET 6 regression causes UseEndpoints to throw an ArgumentNullException in MVC-only project w/ conditional compilation #40719
    6.0.x
  • Trying out Blazor Server #41818
    7.0-preview6
  • Building the .NET MAUI Repo for Blazor Hybrid #41842
    7.0-preview6
  • Getting Started with Blazor Hybrid #41841
    7.0-preview6
  • Response content type in custom exception middleware - serialization for Json and XML #40857
    Discussions
  • dotnet watch does not apply changes in razor page #41645
  • Signlar 1006 error on win 2016 server when message size incresed #41675
  • Blazor WASM SEO Performance Test Issue #41807
  • Add in-library support for DisplayFormat Attribute on Blazor model properties #41840
  • Blazor NullReferenceException at AuthorizeViewCore.OnParametersSetAsync() in Published App but runs fine locally #41748
  • Set authorization for all areas #41839
  • ForEach Re Render #41754
  • Design validation for Minimal APIs #30666
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Blazor] strongly defined page path and also default page path #41827
  • Using UsePathBase with querystring from root throws exception #38058
    6.0.x
  • Blazor AOT publish failed on Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.dll #40209
    6.0.x
  • OData conventional routing not supports multiple endpoint for a entity with different prefix in path #41864
  • Failed to launch debug adapter / the operation was canceled when trying to launch project in WSL profile #41768
  • Custom serialization with TextOutputFormatter is slow #41804
    Discussions
  • Add option to control whether controller names are trimmed or not when used for routing #41730

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding WebTransport Handshake to Kestrel #41877
    area-runtime
  • Windows.11.Amd64.ClientPre.Open is leaving in June, switch to non-preview #41876
    area-infrastructure
  • Backport 41868 to release/6.0 #41870
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.x
  • Backport 41838 to release/6.0 #41869
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 6.0.x
  • Fix time/datetime-local binding with seconds when there's no step attribute #41868
    area-blazor, Status:InProgress
  • Use GetFolderPath(UserProfile) to obtain HOME dir #41865
    area-dataprotection, area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Quarantine InvalidProcessPath_ExpectServerError #41857
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Blazor router handle base URLs without trailing slash plus query/hash #41838
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview6

Updated

  • Update SDK #41798
    area-infrastructure
  • Add overloads to WithTags and others targeting IEndpointConventionBuilder #41830
    area-runtime
  • DataProtection use 6.0 app discriminator trailing slash format #41849
    area-dataprotection
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Tratcher/h2ws #41558
    area-runtime
  • Add dotnet user-jwts tool #41520
    area-commandlinetools
  • Enable trim analyzer #41683
    area-infrastructure
  • Add IgnoreQueryString parameter to NavLink #40990
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Convert all possible `DllImport`s to `LibraryImport` for .NET 7+ #41573
    area-runtime
  • Handle spaces after request line #41823
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.7
  • Quarantine ShadowCopyCleansUpOlderFolders #41854
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Add test for assembly versions in our packages #41761
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider adding a parameter to !clrstack allowing only the first n frames to be printed #3093
    7.0.0

Closed

  • dotnet-dump should show error message for OS errors #2976
    7.0.0
  • dotnet dump creates empty file for process not running managed code #3064
    7.0.0
  • Make GCDump tool available as a library #3092

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • can maui execute code using interperter mode for upload app to appstore? #7516
  • [Android] ListView crashes when navigating to another tab and back #7513
  • iOS Layouts not resizing #7507
  • Unable to run MAUI app after updating to the latest version #7505
  • Resx file does not produce designer file, application is crashing #7504
  • Getting a XamlC error when trying to use common xmlns only in XAML without x:Name #7503
  • Image Retry + Retry Delay #7502
  • Grid measures and layouts itself and children incorrectly #7499
  • Input Transparent not working properly (Android Simulator) when BoxView has InputTransparent set to true and then set to false in backend code. #7498
  • Content page not scrollable and the controls below CarouselView moves on top of CarouselView #7497
  • CarouselView Orientation is Vertical even when set to Horizontal #7496
  • CollectionView within a CollectionView is very slow when loading items #7494
  • The indicatorView render outside of border #7493
  • [Windows][Android][6.0.312] InputTransparent logic/intended behavior #7489
  • LinearGradientBrush overflow button making CornerRadius invisible #7488
  • Entry show without Underline or Bottom line in MAUI GA #7487
  • The underline of label is not displayed on ios and maccatalyst #7486

Closed

  • Buttons missing ripple effect in windows? #7492
  • ListView not scrolling, not selecting after update, extremely slow to update #6943
    6.0.3xx-sr1
  • ListView w/ Binding, Delete first item -> Crash (Maui RC3, Android) #7406
    6.0.3xx-sr1
  • [Android] The ItemTapped event of ListView has no response for a while after Shell's tab changed #6584
    6.0.3xx-sr1
  • ContentView: Setting the ControlTemplate dynamically causes the control to disappear #4135
    6.0.300-servicing
  • WinForms BlazorHybrid application fails to run on other machines after being published #7455
  • Editor's SizeChanged event does not get called #5791
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Android: ControlTemplate within a CollectionView ItemTemplate fails to update templated UI when a TemplateBinding changes value #4242
    6.0.300-servicing
  • RC1 - SearchBar does not detect assigned Style #6444
    6.0.300-servicing
  • ANDROID: apk release version is differ from Debug Mode (GA) #7461
  • [RC2] Android - The Navigation.PushModalAsync view cannot be full screen when the NavigationBar and StatusBar was hidden. #6589
    6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Getting started tutorial - hot reload is not working #7441
  • Windows Machine keeps saying Type '/' to search from your saved info #7233

PullRequests

Created

  • Fill ScrollView when content is smaller than viewport #7514
    area/layout 🔲
  • Hide non visible shell parts from VO #7512
    area/shell 🐢, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Set GenerateDocumentationFile=true for Compatibility and Xaml and pack a special docs artifact #7511
    area/docs 📓
  • Return VER for PlatformView #7509
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Fix SearchBar MaxLength property #7495
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry

Merged

  • Resolving TableView/ListView issues #7485
    area/ListView
  • [Handlers] Make sure to update Content on handlers when the ControlTemplate changes #7235
    area/controls 🎮
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #7506
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix Format #7500
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Use .NET 6 built-in dotnet format tool #6371
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix swapping root page from Shell to Non Shell #7415
    area/shell 🐢

Updated

  • [workload] Remove Microsoft.Maui.Extensions pack #5918
    area/setup 🪄, .NET 7
  • Better handle disappearing content with ViewPager2 #7425
    area/shell 🐢
  • Merge the PublicAPI checker into main #7339
    p/0, area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • [iOS] Fix cell size changed on CollectionView #7447
    area/collectionview 📃, 6.0.3xx-sr1

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is there any way to add key annotations in cs files generated from Grpc proto files? #28112
  • How to add a custom MemberTranslator for DateOnly #28111
  • EF Core fails to track property if it's set up as JSON #28109
  • EFCore 7.0-preview.4 with precompiled Model: The binary operator Equal is not defined for the types 'System.Int64' and 'System.Nullable`1[System.Int64]' #28108
  • EF Core migration alters field lengths in unrelated AspNet tables #28106
  • Entity framework .net6 generating wrong queries with old column names that don't exist anymore #28107
  • `dotnet-ef migrations add` starts entire application when CreateHostBuilder method is not present #28105
  • SQL Server: Translate statistics aggregate functions #28104
  • Consider implementing GetAsyncEnumerator extension method on IQueryable<T> to simplify consuming EF queries with await foreach #28103

Closed

  • Exclude LazyLoader when use System.Text.Json #28083
    7.0.0-preview6

PullRequests

Created

  • Custom aggregate translations #28110

Merged

  • add support for System.Text.Json not including LazyLoader #28084
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Query: Use GetDiscriminatorValue for TPT and TPC #28070
  • Query: Provide a way to translate aggregate methods on top level #28102
    auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Loc]Info for .Net 6.0 are not updated on .Net 6 preivew 2 SDK installation wizard for locale language. #9902

PullRequests

Merged
